availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter Solomon Williams (Calloway County, KY, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer. Calloway County, Kentucky, native. Married Mary E. Cox Williams in Marshall County on December 15, 1853. Father of James H. Williams, Dora A. Williams, and Parabe L. Williams. Farmer in Calloway County in 1850. Farmer in Calloway County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, District 1, p. 455B.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, Wadesborough Precinct, p. 114A.
